about_the_game:
A stout secret has been brewing below...

In your Journeys, you may have uncovered many secrets of the dungeon. However, a hardy herd of daring dwarves have been hard at work, securing their freedom in a hidden hall of the dungeon. Their ingenuity knows no bounds, and their hideout harbours all manner of cunning contraptions that you will have to contend with in your adventure through the Dwarven Halls!

A bonus floor, filled with fun and fright

Explore an extra floor of the dungeon, filled to bursting with a variety of new encounters and surprises! The dwarves that inhabit these halls have gone to extreme measures to defend themselves, and you'll need to be prepared to deal with the warlike, wondrous, and downright weird creations they have left behind!

Add even more variety to your Journey

Over a dozen new encounters can be found in the Dwarven Halls, and you can choose to explore the dangerous dwarven depths as part of each run through the dungeon. Brave the halls, and you'll be rewarded with a number of powerful artefacts that will serve you well in your adventures further below.

New allies, new enemies, new endings!

You'll need to bring all of your wit to uncover all of the secrets in the Dwarven Halls, as well as a fair amount of elbow grease to deal with their misled machinations! However, should you succeed, you will be able to tap into new powers thought lost to time. You may also find that these powers unlock new endings to your Journey, if you manage to reach the bottom of the dungeon...
